name: afya-link
description: AfyaLink is a comprehensive web application designed to improve community health access and education in Kitengela, Kenya. The platform provides essential health services, education, and emergency support to the local community.

scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd server && npm install && node index.js
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
